MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the KY16 postcode area of St Andrews. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 12:38pm. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of the complexity of the work required and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 5:45pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 3.43pm on Saturday 20th February 2021.
